lcMultipleSelect.lcQuestion: When does it make the most sense to compile your topics into a bookmap rather than a map? (choose any)

lcAnswerOption.lcAnswerContent: When you need book-like structures (such as introductory material or chapters) in your published content
When you're publishing a very short collection of topics, none of which are nested inside each other
When you need flexible, sophisticated options for storing metadata about your published content
When you need to deliver your content in an electronic format only
